OT/outputs/prompts/structured_prompt.txt"

# === Locate Latest Summary File ===
LATEST_SUMMARY=$(ls -t "$SUMMARY_DIR"/*.json 2>/dev/null | head -n 1)
if [ -z "$LATEST_SUMMARY" ]; then
  echo "❌ No summary file found in $SUMMARY_DIR"
  exit 1
fi
